Content:: The second Gotabaya Rajapaksa cabinet was the central government of Sri Lanka led by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa. It was formed in August 2020 after the parliamentary election and ended on 3 April 2022 after all 26 cabinet ministers resigned en masse amidst the 2022 Sri Lankan protests.[1] Ministers appointed under article 43(1) of the constitution. Ministers appointed under article 44(1) of the constitution.
